Vengeance Shroud.name: Vengeance Shroud
Vengeance Shroud.flavor: Exerting your will, you force order onto the chaos of battle and turn the hostility of your adversaries into suffering.
Vengeance Shroud.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity or Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The first time the target hits or misses on each of its turns, it takes 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Vengeance Shroud.effect: The burst creates a zone of order that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, any ally gains the following benefit: The first time the ally makes an attack roll on each of his or her turns, he or she can choose to take 10 on the attack roll, rather than roll a d20

Rrathmal Pursuit.name: Rrathmal Pursuit
Rrathmal Pursuit.flavor: Even as your opponent withdraws, you are in motion, cutting off its retreat.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An adjacent enemy shifts away from you  Effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Rrathmal Pursuit.trigger: An adjacent enemy shifts away from you
Rrathmal Pursuit.effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
